duties_responsibilities.duty: Produce and distribute invoicing and post accounts receivable payments.
Maintain appropriate ledgers, resolve credit balances and account problems, post claim denials, refunds, adjustments, and other account actions.

Responsible for all aspects of Accounts Receivable, from posting customer payments to researching missing payments. This involves independent research and working with the payroll and shipping departments to resolve outstanding balances.
Prepare and submit daily bank deposits.
Follow up with clients to resolve unpaid invoices.
Process daily ACH and positive pay files.
Assist the finance department with other projects as needed.
